channel.title: Poems on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Poems on Home

item.title: Lingering
item.description: Their perceptions of you and me just linger In the air, in the heads, until they are dead Like revenge or karma Enraging with all its ignorance And sedating with all its care The words, the forms, the actions That's all they focus on In sane method Of soul insanity To negate your confront.

item.title: Bag of Mail, Fee Mail
item.description: Women are competitive socially but not physically Yet their narcissism is body based Men are competitive with their bodies but not socially Yet their narcissism is based on social inclusion (in the women's world) Men are supposed to be all equal (religious pacifier for violence?

item.title: Settlers
item.description: Some settle without reason Just cause It's what others do It's for the best Just like the rest Some settle with a reason In hard times To survive With underlying Managed discontent Some don't settle unconsciously Not knowing their motives An undefined need A traumatic symptom To pretend they are normal Some don't settle consciously With enough social clout And basic fulfillment Knowing the reasons Experienced in their killing joke Could never be it's just for the money And lie like it's love As much as I want to Order someone around Like ownership And fullfilling mental roles Even if it is wanted Or exploited just the same too Love is the killing joke for me it seems No woman or man is to me No child or god either.

item.title: Dis Grunt Led
item.description: Everything is awesome They try to say (to a programmer) Like some fucking joke For getting them laid. It is their identity Better you create it Than they. Better they make you obsolete With respect To still be accepted In a woman's lay Like some fucking view You can use to chew Like confidence They portray To put down your pay And take the day To make your anger Unfounded and gay To burn your bridges In an indirect way To make you believe And tease the cheese To laugh at your experience And uncomfortable needs She hates how it is Like a triumph of selfish rights Blinding that what does not exist Like a pimp, or a hairless monkey With money, like a bitch They cannot stand It does not make any sense That they would go for his cents Or anything else they must Make it not matter For what she needs instead of he In a feigned love Of type A stress Alpha-best and B-lose Ex-Plaining the ISO late, son (isolation) Comp-art Mentalize the view For a version of herself That cannot be he The just-ify-ed narcy-cyst Who cannot get upset Only upset your back In kindness Like mocking settlers For not partaking And indulging In an easy life Of easy drugs, Sex and news.

item.title: Power of Love
item.description: To disrupt the scales Of beauty as power To separate power From love To turn away narcissus For compassion To remember what love is with understanding To protect our lonely selves From the world For each other

item.title: Silence of the Fams
item.description: Will they ever stop screaming how horrible I am? Will they ever stop lying or horrifying? Will they ever stop pretending, that it's effortless? Will they ever not have to or have the time? Will they ever stop projecting an ignorant example?

item.title: Imp Ear, Real
item.description: The SS Enterprise Of the imperialists Is a catch 22 Earthship. They can push you To greatness Or overboard at anytime Befriend you so greatly You will jump Of your own will. Unloyal to my own ship Less than a second class citizen Spoiled to seek safety And eat my cake, true.

item.title: The Other Side
item.description: The other side of life Is Venus 2.0. Eliminating the bad ones To create more heat. They only like the ones like themselves. Only want more Nothing personal, Apparently. The rest are two-headed inbred morons Trying to ruin it All they can say is "We know we are beautiful" And assume the position Of sticking the ass You mean In your face.

item.title: Star for the Dumb
item.description: When men are dumb and bored If they have hair They can at least become A media idiot (medidiot) Or pseudo leaders For the dumber to absorb Without much worry To other mens sense of selves Reproductive ability Or holy jesus image Which is what it is all about For the fragile war of self Inside the egg Against the world.

item.title: Moth of Her
item.description: She punishes shame For the embarassment to her And the burden of care Like it's a trade For a rough blame Never seeing the damage Or responsibility In denial of unlove Never questioning the reason She already knows Incorrectly

item.title: Dead Man's Tell
item.description: In a world connected like a media show A commercialized profile To fuel the dream that sells Building circles unconsciously Around who are Too bad for men, it's women and boys that rule that world There is a word for racism Sexism and agism But there no word For discrimination of the ugly?

item.title: The Mask of Kara
item.description: Part One: Paranoid Android Gets directed So no thing is affected With a hemaroid Named Floyd And a bowl of debt Full of regret Is that hope I hear? Or denial I fear I love them all But all never enough To be the porridge Of my dreams The flower turns It's shame invisible In a show of pain For someone else To mend the shell Of the lord of flies It is easy to focus As they cloak us On just one word That is never heard She only has one idea in mind You are going to lose Like you deserve Because most of the world Is better than that still You will get used to it With a dummy you can't stand Instead of the death of false Coming from both As if somehow the oath Of rejection Will make them safe again Safe again Without men From the fear of loss Or being without a toss Or their connection To their fiction Of the strands of time That cost a dime Part Two: Look for John without bucks Son For the Mask of Kara Is in your eye And you have no one Left to help It became clear as it has always been year after year There is no win with an empty friend only more sin and no way to end Some losses are too great For society to create Much horror Of an easy adorer But what will become Of the total sum After the sadness Does not turn to gladness When she says farewell After a lengthy affair Loud will sound the bell For your fair share It matches your guests In a suit that earns you The greatest of jests In such an evil rue To burn your tree Into the ground Ignored is your plea Joy is never found Part Three: It is not me He cried internally To keep the flow Of letting go Which was only a sign To the keepers of know He was not benign and could not mow If only he had fought It might have bought His ascension Into another dimension At first, it seemed To be too mean And confusing The misusing losing Which only brought Nothing he sought Into a lost decade His soul decayed They still live In their ignorant fun His mind will sour To their attempts at power

item.title: Eye Division
item.description: I see the misery division Expecting a sense of urgency Reinforcing weaknesses With opposite strengths Wanting their tit for a tat Sharing the pain For a missing floor And make believe ceiling I see a joy division Avoiding damages done

item.title: When Things Go Wrong
item.description: I watch them beat you, Watch them beat you down. There is nothing I can do, Brother, just like you. So when things go wrong, Go wrong with you, It hurts me too. They say you know, You know what to do.
